GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a single review by the id given

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: amend the votes of a single review by the id given, with an input object

input object.inc_votes: newVote(a positive/negative integer to increment/decrement the number of votes)

review.title: One Night Ultimate Werewolf
review.votes: the new total, as amended by the input object

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on the given review

comments.author: roalddahl
comments.body: zaphod's just this guy, you know?

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: enters a new comment against the given review id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from the database by the given id

GET /api/users.description: provides an array of userNames from the database
